description: This event type is triggered when a new study is created in the Metadata Repository service.

associated_files.description: A list of files associated with the newly created study.

creation_date.description: Timestamp (in ISO 8601 format) when the entity was created.

file_id.description: The public ID of the file (as generated by the Metadata Repository service)

format.description: The format of the file: BAM, SAM, CRAM, BAI, etc.

md5_checksum.description: The md5-checksum of the file content.

size.description: The size of a file in bytes.

update_date.description: Timestamp (in ISO 8601 format) when the entity was updated.

id.description: The internal unique identifier for an entity.

timestamp.description: The time when the event was published.

title: new_study_created
